```css
// Property: accessoryType
// Description: Sets an accessory on the right side of an item.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.ListItem
'.accessory-type-list-none': { accessoryType: Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_NONE }
'.accessory-type-list-checkmark': { accessoryType: Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_CHECKMARK }
'.accessory-type-list-detail': { accessoryType: Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DETAIL }
'.accessory-type-list-disclosure': { accessoryType: Ti.UI.LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DISCLOSURE }
```
